story: Dr. Eternity is a sorcerer who has managed to achieve immortality using a special wax that allows him to transfer a person's soul energies to himself. The soul stealing must be done by performing a ritual in the Beyond . Each person's soul he steals extends his life expectancy and increases his health and physical strength. He has lived this way for 1500 years and at any given time has the strength of approximately 10 men. The person who's soul is stolen dies. Dr. Eternity keeps the wax-covered corpses of his victims in a personal collection.
Additionally, Dr. Eternity is one of the few people who is able to open a portal to the Beyond. He also has skills at various other spells.
Dr. Eternity assisted Isaac Newton in unlocking the power of the comet stone. Along with Lord Nox, he also transfer some of that power along with power from the Beyond to the Nox Eternity Crystals.
During World War II, Dr. Eternity was the sometines foe, sometimes ally of the Black Fury and his battles against the creatures of the Beyond.
